formulas.raw: Personal income tax (ESt), piecewise by assessed income tax T and filing status s: For single filers: T_0 = 16{,}956,\quad T_1 = 31{,}527 SolZ(T) = \begin{cases} 0, & T \le T_0 \\ 0.119 \cdot (T - T_0), & T_0 < T \le T_1 \\ 0.055 \cdot T, & T > T_1 \end{cases} For married/joint assessment: T_0 = 33{,}912,\quad T_1 = 63{,}055 SolZ(T) = \begin{cases} 0, & T \le T_0 \\ 0.119 \cdot (T - T_0), & T_0 < T \le T_1 \\ 0.055 \cdot T, & T > T_1 \end{cases} Corporate income tax and capital income withholding: SolZ = 0.055 \cdot T
